General.Name: Dalian Friendship Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Dalian Friendship (Group) Co., Ltd. operates retail department stores in China. It also engages in the hotel management; and real estate development businesses. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Dalian, China. Dalian Friendship (Group) Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Wuhan Development Investment Co., Ltd.
